column4: hi i just install ubuntu and i don't have the password root, how i can check it? why it doesn't ask it me before?
to change the root password, make a # sudo passwd root
no, bt there is no root password at the begenning
ya un root mais il n'est pas initialis
non pas si tu fais un sudo passwd root
